name: Demonic Aura Nine-Sword Style Asura: Demon Nine Flash

trigger.text: You may rest up to one of your opponent's cost 4 or less characters.

text: Main Up to one of your leader or character cards gains +3000 power during this turn. Then, you may rest one of your cost 3 or greater characters. If you did, rest up to one of your opponent's cost 5 or less characters.

effect.text: Up to one of your leader or character cards gains +3000 power during this turn. Then, you may rest one of your cost 3 or greater characters. If you did, rest up to one of your opponent's cost 5 or less characters.
You may rest up to one of your opponent's cost 4 or less characters.
